questionsAnswered.title: Your Questions, Answered
questionsAnswered.description: Get quick answers to the most common questions about our platform and services.

faq1.question: What platforms does dima cover?
faq1.answer: dima covers both traditional and social media platforms. Traditional includes: Online Publications, Print Publications, TV & Radio. Social Media includes: TikTok, X, Snapchat, Facebook, Instagram & LinkedIn. There are other sources covered by dima as well like Google Maps Reviews & others in the pipeline. If you don't see the platform you want in the list, contact us to see when it will be available, our team is probably working on it already!

faq2.question: What is the accuracy in Arabic? Does it detect slang, franco and dialects?
faq2.answer: 97% and improving! dima is the first regionally built monitoring platform dedicated to leading agencies and enterprises in the region. As such, it is built to handle Arabic written posts, images and videos at its core

faq3.question: How long does it take to set up an account?
faq3.answer: Once you book a demo, if you like dima, you can be up & running in less than 48 hours, during the demo our team will give you a live tour of dima, answering any questions you may have and then providing you with access to dima where you control users, keywords, topics of interest and reporting 24/7.

faq.question: Does using dima mean that my data can be leaked to my competitors?
faq.answer: dima does not share any account's data. Your account data is stored securely and exclusively for your use. Likewise, no current client's data can ever be accessed or shared with another account.

faq.question: What is the Arabic accuracy for social media listening?
faq.answer: dima delivers 97% accuracy in Arabic for social media monitoring listening, and that rate is continuously improving. dima is Arabic-first, built in the region to capture dialects, slang, and Franco-Arabic.

faq.question: What platforms does dima monitor?
faq.answer: dima covers both traditional and social media platforms. Traditional includes: Online Publications, Print Publications, TV & Radio. Social Media includes: TikTok, X, Snapchat, Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn & more. There are other sources covered by dima as well like Google Maps Reviews & others in the pipeline. If you don't see the platform you want in the list, contact us to see when it will be available, our team is probably working on it already!

faq.question: Is there a limitation on the number of users for the platform?
faq.answer: No, dima has no limitation on the number of users per single account.

faq.question: Is there a limitation on the number of reports to be extracted from dima per day/month?
faq.answer: No, dima has no limitation on the number of reports extracted.

faq.question: Is there a client view that allows for sharing instant insights, reports, and live monitoring?
faq.answer: Yes, dima offers different access levels for the expert and the client, providing the client with easy accessibility and the expert with full control.
